mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_mentor (mentor_id, passwd, name, region, age, nickname, lngName, portfolio, intro, mNo, gradeByMNum) VALUES (#{mentor_id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{region}, #{age}, #{nickname}, #{lngName}, #{portfolio}, #{intro}, #{mNo}, #{gradeByMNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_mentor ORDER BY mentorNo DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE user_mentor SET passwd = #{passwd}, name = #{name}, region = #{region}, nickname = #{nickname}, lngName = #{lngName}, portfolio = #{portfolio} WHERE mentorNo = #{mentorNo}
